data.name: Notch Original Soundtrack - Omega Episode
data.detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for Notch The Innocent LunA: Eclipsed SinnerS - Omega Episode, created by talented composers such as Yoake Nemu, Unnamed(+Silent Rebirth+) and Invoke. Enjoy the rhythmic and wonderful tracks.

You can find all downloaded tracks in this directory: steamapps\common\The Innocent Luna Eclipsed SinnerS\Notch Original Soundtrack - Omega Episode\

Trackllist:

  • 01. Perfect 03:54
  • 02. Paradise in Dream 01:51
  • 03. Truth 02:13
  • 04. Black Hole 03:41
  • 05. Collapse 02:41
  • 06. Another World 03:05
  • 07. Faraway Memories 02:42
  • 08. Forgotten Orient 01:31
  • 09. Dream of Lass 03:18
  • 10. Pain of Lass 03:12
  • 11. Last Illusion 03:08
  • 12. Night Sky 03:24
  • 13. After the Rain 01:54
  • 14. Open Your Heart 02:40
  • 15. Pure Sin 06:21
  • 16. Schwarzwald 04:19
  • 17. Secret Melody 02:14
  • 18. Last Choice 02:48
  • 19. Confrontation 01:24
  • 20. Different Ways 02:30
  • 21. Conclusion 03:06
  • 22. Silent World 00:37
  • 23. Heart 05:16
  • 24. Rotten Flowers 02:16
  • 25. Golden Butterflies 02:12
  • 26. Golden Butterflies(Vocal Ver.) 02:04
  • 27. Scars of Sands 04:04
